name: PartnerStack
headline: PartnerStack is a full stack solution for partnerships.
description:
PartnerStack is a full stack solution for partnerships. The platform supports partner marketing, referral, and reseller activity, and solves for partner application management, engagement, attribution, education, payouts, compliance, and additional partner channel needs.

Companies using PartnerStack have their program listed in PartnerStack's marketplace, exposing their program to a growing network of +450,000 partners. These companies see a +30% revenue increase in their partner channels due to partners acquired through PartnerStack's network. The network allows partners to sell multiple SaaS applications from a single platform - a necessity for integrated SaaS solutions investing in channel.

The most trusted and fastest growing SaaS companies in the world are turning to PartnerStack to support their channel growth, including Intuit, Asana, Freshworks, Zendesk, Aircall, Intercom, and more.

founders.name: Neil Chudleigh, Cofounder
founders.description:
Founder of superwhisper (https://superwhisper.com)

Co-founder of PartnerStack

generated_description:
PartnerStack is a Toronto-based company founded in 2015 as part of Y Combinator's Batch S15. It aims to revolutionize how businesses interact with their partners by offering a full-stack solution for partnerships. Think of it as the Swiss Army knife for partner marketing; it covers everything from managing partner applications to tracking engagement and handling payouts.

With a growing marketplace featuring over 450,000 partners, PartnerStack helps businesses expand their reach. Companies utilizing this platform have reported an impressive revenue boost—averaging a 30% increase from the partnerships they gain through PartnerStack. This solution is particularly appealing for SaaS companies, allowing them to sell multiple applications from a single platform. Clients like Intuit, Asana, and Zendesk have already tapped into this growth avenue, showcasing its efficacy in the competitive SaaS landscape.

The platform provides a comprehensive suite of features, tailored for both vendors and partners. Vendors can recruit high-quality partners, activate them with resources, monitor leads, and incentivize them with rewards—all while leveraging data-driven insights to optimize performance. On the partner side, users can easily discover opportunities and earn commissions by promoting trusted software brands.

Now, if you want to experience PartnerStack in action, you can catch a quick five-minute demo on their site. With around 200 employees, PartnerStack is fostering strong connections between B2B SaaS companies and their partners, effectively positioning itself as the go-to platform for partnership growth. 

If you’re interested in exploring more, you can check out their website at [PartnerStack](https://partnerstack.com). Whether you're looking to enhance revenue or streamline partner management, this platform is worth a look.
